title: gus169's SCP Fanart
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div id="myDiv" style="background-color:gray; text-color:white;"]]

------

+++ **Welcome to**

+ **gus169's SCP Fanart**

+++++ Hello SCP world. Just thought I'd share some of my SCP related sketches.

I will be working on learning a bit of wikidot and attempting to improve the presentation of this page over time. I would welcome any input or feedback. 

I am also choosing my subjects 'on the fly', preferencing 'humanoid' and 'unrepresented' (pictorially), but I would welcome any suggestions or requests.

----

++ **SCPs**

----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=SCP-050 "To The Cleverest"|src=https://i.imgur.com/QXrhdo2.jpg|width=60%]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=SCP-070 "Iron Wings"|src=https://i.imgur.com/pk0lVXf.jpg|width=60%]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=SCP-100-1 "Jamaican Joe's Junkyard Jubilee"|src=https://i.imgur.com/VJDbF3z.jpg|width=60%]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=SCP-542 "Herr Chirurg"|src=https://i.imgur.com/5PHSHcq.png|width=60%]]

----

----
